'Europa League 2': Uefa confirms new tournament from 2021

A third European competition with the working title 'Europa League 2' will be introduced from 2021, Uefa has confirmed.

The seventh-placed team from the Premier League will enter the play-offs of the new tournament.

As part of Uefa's 2021-2024 cycle, the Europa League will be halved in size to 32 teams with an extra play-off round between the group stage and last 16.

The new tournament will be played on Thursdays alongside the Europa League.

Every country's champions will still enter the Champions League, but the other teams from smaller countries will go straight into 'UEL2' qualifying instead of the Europa League's early rounds.

The new competition and Europa League will have the same format - eight groups of four teams with the winners going into the last 16. There will be a play-off before that round for the teams who finish second in the group and sides who finish third in the groups of the higher tournament.

The winners of the tournament will qualify for the following season's Europa League.

The Champions League format does not change.

Uefa president Aleksander Ceferin said: "The new competition makes Uefa's club competitions more inclusive than ever before. There will be more matches for more clubs, with more associations represented in the group stages.

"This competition was born out of ongoing dialogue with clubs through the European Club Association."

At least 34 countries will have teams in a group stage, compared to 26 at the moment.

歐洲足協（UEFA）昨日宣布，將於2021/22球季推行全新歐洲盃賽——「歐霸盃2」（UEFA Europa League 2，簡稱UEL2）。「歐霸盃2」將成為繼歐聯及歐霸後，第三級別的歐洲盃賽。是次改革並不會影響歐聯正賽運作，旨在重整歐霸盃架構，讓歐洲足協系數排名較後（15名之後）國家的球隊，在歐洲盃賽有機會進入較後階段。要初步了解「歐霸盃2」，必須首先瞭解它將會對歐聯、歐霸造成甚麼影響及改變。

「歐霸2」賽制簡介

歐洲足協由2021/22球季開始統一各球會盃賽的分組賽隊數，一律將32隊分成4組。「歐霸2」分組賽之前將會有4輪外圍賽，所有球隊必須參與至少1輪外圍賽才能進入分組賽，參加隊伍大多是各國本地盃賽冠軍及歐洲足協系數排名較後（16至55名）國家的聯賽2至4名，冠軍將可以自動晉身來年歐霸分組賽。整個「歐霸2」比賽連外圍賽，總共有141場賽事。

球迷最關心的歐洲五大聯賽（暫為西甲、英超、德甲、意甲及法甲），將各自只有一席參加「歐霸2」的資格（本地盃賽冠軍），若該盃賽冠軍已具歐聯或歐霸的參賽資格，其「歐霸2」外圍賽參賽資格將順延至聯賽排名最高又沒有歐洲賽資格的球隊。

「歐霸2」晉級路線：

第一輪外圍賽（只有歐洲足協系數排名29至55國家的聯賽隊伍參與）第二輪外圍賽第三輪外圍賽第四輪外圍賽（五大聯賽球隊加入）分組賽（32隊分8組）附加賽（由歐霸分組賽第3名對「歐霸2」分組賽次名）16強（由「歐霸2」分組賽首名對附加賽贏家）

「歐霸2」如何影響歐聯？

雖說「歐霸2」並不會影響歐聯正賽，但預賽至第三輪外圍賽的輸家卻會降至「歐霸2」外圍賽作賽。20隊歐聯預賽至第一輪外圍賽的輸家將直接降至「歐霸2」第二輪外圍賽；而5隊歐聯第三輪外圍賽的輸家將降至「歐霸2」第四輪外圍賽。

「眼利」的讀者或許會發現，歐聯第二輪外圍賽的輸家並不會降至「歐霸2」，改制後它們將會降至歐霸盃外圍賽。這樣就出現一個吊詭的情況—歐聯第三輪外圍賽的輸家反而要降至更低組別的盃賽，變相會否鼓勵實力較弱的球隊走線？

以今年為例，於歐聯第三輪外圍賽出局而較有名氣的球隊包括蘇超的些路迪。

「歐霸2」如何影響歐霸？

歐霸的影響則比較簡單，由歐霸第三輪外圍賽開始，將陸續有外圍賽輸家會進入「歐霸2」的外圍賽，甚至直接進入分組賽。

要數「歐霸2」賽制特別之處，為其分組賽與16強之間，會加插一輪附加賽，讓歐霸盃分組賽各組第3名與「歐霸2」分組賽各組次名對壘，決出8隊與「歐霸2」分組賽首名進入「歐霸2」16強。

由歐聯改制加入大量小國球會，到推出歐洲國家聯賽，及至現在「歐霸2」的誕生，歐洲足協的意圖其實非常明顯——吸納足球小國支持，將賽事重新包裝，提升「吸金」力。以現時英超積分榜為例，假若足總盃冠軍早已獲得歐洲賽資格，排在第七名的曼聯將出戰「歐霸2」。

歐洲足協在1999年之前，一直有3個級別的球會賽事，不過隨着專屬歐洲國內盃賽冠軍隊伍參與的歐洲盃賽冠軍盃（UEFA Cup Winners' Cup）於99/00年球季開始停辦起，就僅餘下歐聯及歐霸兩級別球會賽事。

039 - "Inclusive competition means more matches for more clubs and more associations" – UEFA President Aleksander Čeferin

More clubs from more associations will play European football from 2021, after the UEFA Executive Committee approved the creation of a third UEFA club competition for the 2021–2014 competition cycle at their meeting in Dublin.

• The new competition (which has the working title of UEL2) will mirror the existing UEFA Champions League and UEFA Europa League, and feature 32 teams in a group stage.

• The format will see eight groups of four teams, followed by the round of 16, quarter-finals, semi-finals and final.

• An additional knockout round will be played before the round of 16 between teams ranked second in their groups and the third-ranked teams of the UEFA Europa League groups.

• The new competition will feature 141 matches over 15 match weeks, exactly like the UEFA Europa League.

• The winner of the new competition will be entitled to participate in the UEFA Europa League in the following season.

• The new competition matches will be played on Thursdays. As such, the UEFA Champions League continues to be played on Tuesdays and Wednesdays, the UEFA Europa League and the new competition will be played on Thursday with one additional kick-off time slot for a limited number of matches in principle at 16:30CET to be further defined.

• All club competition finals will be played in the same week: Wednesday (new competition), Thursday (UEFA Europa League) and Saturday (UEFA Champions League).
